text: [[img:bullet_ksl_winter]][[/img]]Each faction has its own agenda, such as establishing Araby as a global superpower, sacking and raiding to build a reputation at sea, or deciding the fate and loyalty of their own tribe. However, all of them pursue their unique goals in the service of Araby.||[[img:bullet_tmb_souls]][[/img]]Araby has access to a wide variety of units, though of rather mediocre quality, especially among its infantry. To fully develop their strength, they rely on a combined-arms approach, making use of skirmishers, fast cavalry, and powerful Elephant and Djinn units to achieve victory.
